title: Billing-only UI: remove Intake navigation, dashboard content, and route

requirements.summary: Remove the Intake top-level navigation item from the Header so navigation is Billing-focused.
acceptanceCriteria: The header no longer renders a top-level navigation link labeled "Intake".
The remaining header menus (e.g., Billing and Account) continue to function and open/close as before.

file_operations.description: Remove the "/intake" Link and any "Intake" label rendering from the header navigation while keeping Billing/Account dropdown behavior unchanged.

requirements.summary: Remove Intake promotional/CTA content from the Home dashboard and update copy to be Billing-only.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page no longer contains a CTA button/link that navigates to "/intake" or is labeled "Patient Intake"/"Intake".
Home page no longer contains an "Intake" service card or any intake-related "blog"/feature highlight content.
Any remaining Home page descriptive text is updated so it does not mention patient intake (Billing-focused copy only).

file_operations.description: Remove the hero CTA Link to "/intake", remove the Intake service card/section Link to "/intake", and update the hero/marketing copy to be Billing-focused only.

requirements.summary: Remove the Intake page from the TanStack Router flow and ensure visiting /intake does not show Intake UI (redirect or not-found style behavior).
acceptanceCriteria: The TanStack Router route definition for path "/intake" no longer renders the Intake page UI.
Direct navigation to "/intake" does not display the Intake page content; users are instead sent to a Billing-relevant destination (e.g., "/billing") or an equivalent not-found experience.
No other existing Billing, Hospice Billing, Manifest, or Receivables routes are broken by this change.

file_operations.description: Create a minimal route component used only for "/intake" that immediately sends users to a Billing-relevant destination (preferably "/billing") and does not display any Intake page content.

Remove the import and route configuration that renders the Intake page, and replace the "/intake" route with a redirect/not-found style route (e.g., using the new IntakeRedirect component) without impacting existing Billing/Hospice/Manifest/Receivables routes.
Remove the unused Intake page implementation so it cannot be rendered by routing and is no longer part of the app flow.
